user_request: Where can I buy a nice beach cooler?
screen_desc: This screenshot shows the home screen of a smartphone with a soft pink gradient background. The top displays the date ("Tuesday, Oct 11") and the current time ("3:53"). The bottom of the screen features a row of app icons, including the Google Play Store, Messages, Google Photos, Google Chrome, and YouTube,along with a Google search bar at the bottom. The icons have a rounded, soft design, and the search bar includes the Google Assistant microphone icon for voice search functionality.
